data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Giraldes, Bruno Welter, Al-Maslamani, Ibrahim, Smyth, David (2017): A new species of leucosiid crab (Decapoda: Brachyura: Leucosiidae) from the Arabian Gulf. Zootaxa 4250 (4): 389-395, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4250.4.9|5 occurrences
